item.title: Agglomeration economies and the internet
item.description: Agglomeration economies and the internet Links https://ideas.repec.org/a/eee/juecon/v73y2013i1p94-110.html Motivating questions What is the effect of the internet on agglomeration economies? How much of the benefits of colocation are ameliorated by the internet? What are the contours of the Internet’s effect on the benefits of colocation? Obviously, being in the same place is still important. In what ways can the internet allow people to capture these benefits and in what ways is it still limited?
